sentence.Network_en: You know how all elves are forced to sing and dance?
sentence.Network_cn: 知道精灵们是怎样被逼迫的又唱又跳?

sentence.Network_en: You think Santa makes them his little elves?
sentence.Network_cn: 你以为是圣诞老人把他们变成他的小精灵 吗 ?

entry.def: Elves is the plural of elf.

means.word_mean: 1. an acronym for emissions of light and very low frequency perturbations due to electromagnetic pulse sources; extremely bright extremely short (less than a msec) electrical flashes forming a huge ring (up to 400 km diameter) in the ionosphere
